name: Monster's Dungeon Shop
description:
In Monster's Dungeon Shop,  sell as much as item in 60 second to accumulate as much coin as you can.

---

All of the assets are created during the jam. Construct 3 game engine, Krita, and SFXR were the software I used to create this game.

---
This game is created for Ludum Dare #51 Compo by Deniz ARAS with the theme of every 10 Second. Hope you like the game. Do not forget to leave a comment about the game!

---

You can find both source code and windows version on download button on this page.

---

If you experience any bug related to the restarting your game, you should refresh or reopen the game to fix it. (Sorry for the inconvenience)
